Text: Account not found. Please check your user name
Account created. A confirmation email was sent. Please check your email to confirm and complete login

Text: Congratulations on creating your Asmodee.net account! Your account gives you many rewards: new Heroes, cards, a starter deck, a gift of 3000 Valor points, and the first Quest free!
Text_CN:
恭喜您创建了新的爱思摩的账号！
您的新账号给与您许多奖励：新的英雄，卡牌，初始卡组，3000勇猛点，以及免费的第一个冒险包！

Text: The time has come to begin your journey. Go forth and fare well!
Text_CN: 开启征程的时候到了，去吧，再会！

Text: The user name is not available. Please try a different one
Text_CN: 用户名不可用，请重新选择

Text:
Are you sure you want to skip the tutorial?

You can replay it at any time through the Game Options menu
Text_CN:

您在游戏设置菜单中可以随时重玩教程

Text: Select any cards you wish to change
Pick up to 2 Favor Cards, or skip this option
Text_CN: 选择最多2张福利卡，或跳过

Text: Pick a Favor Card, or skip this option

This will replace the current Attachment. 
Are you sure?
Text_CN:
将替换已装备的同类装备
确认吗？

Text: Select a highlighted Character to perform Ambush
Text_CN: 选择一个高亮的角色进行伏击
麾下每名盟友增加1点威胁值。

Text: Choose a Hero to remain free of the spiders' webs
Text_CN: 看看是哪个英雄躲过了蜘蛛网

Text: Your last Hero falls, bringing your journey to a tragic end.
Text_CN: 您的最后一个英雄闭上了眼睛，给您的冒险画上了句号

Text: You draw Sauron's full attention, bringing your journey to a tragic end.
Text_CN: 您被索伦彻底的发现了，给您的冒险画上了句号

Text: Each Palantír Pack includes 3 Palantír Views and 1 random new Valor Card
Text_CN: 每个晶石凝视包包含3个晶石凝视和一张随机勇气卡

Text: Though he comes from humble beginnings, Samwise Gamgee rises to any challenge with unmatched bravery and determination. This pack is tailor-made for cleverness, helping you sneak past the watchful Eye of Sauron to claim victory through daring and stealth.
Text_CN: 虽然他出身低微，Samwise Gamgee 面对任何挑战都有无以伦比的勇气和决心 这个卡包专为机智的你定制，帮助你通过大胆和潜行逃过索伦之眼并获得胜利。

Text: Faramir does not seek glory in danger without purpose. Touched by the wisdom and sadness of the Elder Race, he is shrewd in battle. This pack gives you the abilities needed to outlast Sauron’s forces and stand victorious at the battle’s end.
Text_CN: Faramir 不贪求没有目的的荣耀。受到长老一族智慧和悲伤的影响，他在战斗中聪明异常 这个卡包让你有能力和索伦比拼耐力并在最后获得战斗的胜利。

Text: Éowyn is renowned for her courage and compassion. With inner strength strong as tempered steel, she stands unflinching before even the greatest threats. This pack emphasizes cards that help your party defend against any threat no matter how numerous or mighty.
Text_CN: Éowyn 以勇气和同情心著称。内心无比强大如同钢铁，她在最大的威胁面前也不为动容 本卡包侧重让你能抵御强敌的卡牌。

Text: Legolas has unmatched prowess as an archer. Employing acute senses and breathtaking agility, he outmaneuvers foes to defeat them before they even see him coming. This pack taps into Elvish tactics, using wits and swiftness to strike down enemies with deadly accuracy.
Text_CN: Legolas 作为射手有着无可比拟的威力。他感知敏锐，动如脱兔，在敌人看到他之前就能将敌人打败 本卡包侧着Elvish类的技巧，用你的智慧和决断去给与敌人致命一击吧。

Text: Though he comes from humble beginnings, Samwise Gamgee rises to any challenge with unmatched bravery and determination. This pack is tailor-made for cleverness, helping you sneak past the watchful Eye of Sauron to claim victory through daring and stealth.

Text: The Lord of the Rings™: Living Card Game™ is still in active development. Many features, cards, effects and mechanics are subject to change for any number of reasons based on game play data and user feedback. If you run into any game play issues or bugs, or have any feedback, please let us know at our Steam Discussions. We appreciate your taking part in our early access development so that we can refine, balance, and improve the game. Now… on to Middle-earth and the adventures that await you there!

This is a placeholder text for exporting string over 255 characters so do not remove. This is a placeholder text for exporting string over 255 characters so do not remove. This is a placeholder text for exporting string over 255 characters so do not remove.
Text_CN: This is a placeholder text for exporting string over 255 characters so do not remove. This is a placeholder text for exporting string over 255 characters so do not remove. This is a placeholder text for exporting string over 255 characters so do not remove.

Text: The King of Dale seeks an alliance with the Beornings. You have agreed to act as envoy. To reach their lands, you must brave the dangers of Mirkwood Forest.
Your party camps for the night deep within Mirkwood. Later, you wake from troubled sleep to discover that giant spiders have captured your friends!
Though free of the giant spiders' lair, your party is lost in the dark forest. You must get your bearings if you hope to escape the vastness of Mirkwood.
Even as you leave the dangers of Mirkwood Forest behind, new threats arise as you make your way down the mighty Anduin River.
You have reached the land of the Beornings at last. But a new complication arises: Their leader, Grimbeorn the Old, is missing!

A shadow looms over the forest of Mirkwood, threatening all lands east of the Misty Mountains. Hearing of this threat, the King of Dale decides to unite the peoples who live along the dark forest's borders. You agree to act as his envoy to the Beornings. These mighty skin changers dwell under the protection of Grimbeorn the Old in the Anduin Vale to the west. It is not a journey to be undertaken lightly—for, to reach Grimbeorn, you must journey through Mirkwood itself. Indeed, not long after entering the forest, you find yourself surrounded by servants of the growing darkness…

You are traveling deeper into Mirkwood along an overgrown trail when giant spiders ambush your party. They wrap one of your friends in a silken cocoon with horrifying speed, then drag their captive off to be devoured. You cannot abandon your companion to such a fate.
You have rescued your friend, but you quickly decide that your only chance of escape is to fight your way out. You turn to face the swarm of spiders and begin your assault!
You have rescued your friend, but the spiders of Mirkwood continue to swarm around you. Realizing you are in danger of being overwhelmed, you decide to make a run for it!

Though you have escaped the spiders—at least for now—you find yourself far from the main trail. Searching tirelessly, you at last spy the path on the far side of a dark, unnatural-looking stream. As you look for a place to ford, a giant creature emerges from the underbrush to attack!

Your mission to find Grimbeorn the Old has uncovered the presence of Orcs in Mirkwood Forest. This is troubling news indeed. After a long day traveling ever deeper into this foul place, you camp for the night. Sleep comes quickly to your tired eyes, but disturbing dreams soon trouble you—nightmares filled with hundreds of bulbous eyes gleaming from the shadows and countless skittering legs echoing in the darkness. You awaken with a start to find that this wasn't a dream at all! While you slept, the giant spiders of Mirkwood carried off your friends—and have returned to claim you as well! You must escape these vile creatures and rescue your friends from a horrible fate…

Searching through the night, you find your friends being held within a dark glade, surrounded by giant spider webs. They have been bound in cocoons made of strong webbed cords. They beg you to cut them free, but before you can try the spiders descend from the trees to attack you.

You've managed to cut your companions loose, but the spiders are determined to recapture you. They spin giant webs from tree to tree, trapping you in their den. You will have to cut your way through them in order to escape.

You hack through the spiders’ webs but advance only a short distance when an enormous spider appears, blocking your escape! Her many offspring gather behind you, cutting off any retreat. There is no turning back. You must defeat Ungoliant's spawn.

You have rescued your friends and escaped the spiders' lair, only to find yourself lost in the vastness of Mirkwood. Far from the relative safety of the Forest Road, the woods are a dark tangle of twisted trees. It is impossible to know the correct direction to travel within this wooded maze. If you are to find your way out and continue your mission for the King of Dale, you must first find some landmarks to get your bearings…
A stream winds its way through the twisted roots of ancient trees that crowd the riverbank. Traveling this way is hard work. You wonder if you should continue or search for a better path.

A sea of green spreads for miles in all directions from your view atop a low hill. Scanning the horizon, you notice a faint trail of grey smoke rising in the distance. Do you head for the smoke, or do you keep searching for a path out of the forest?

At long last, the stream you have been following leads you to a wide bog. You must be near the Anduin River vale—but reaching the mighty river requires crossing the swamp. Who knows what dangers lie in wait?
After a long, desperate search you find a trail at last. Though it is overgrown and littered with animal tracks, you believe this path leads to the Anduin vale.

Navigating toward the smoke as best you can through the dense forest, you find the remains of an old Woodmen village near the eaves of Mirkwood. Yet your relief is short-lived—the village is overrun with Orcs! As they spot your weary group, it becomes clear that you must fight to reach the Anduin vale.

You stand at the shore of the mighty Anduin River. The many trials of Mirkwood Forest lay behind you at last, but you are still some distance from your destination: the land of the Beornings. Making your way south along the riverbank, you spy a raft which might speed your journey. As you approach the craft, a shadow falls before you: a fearsome Hill Troll looms up from behind a cluster of rocks! He lunges toward you, his eyes gleaming with murderous intent…

Having defeated the Troll, you board a raft and float downriver. You barely have time to catch your breath before more enemies emerge along the river bank in pursuit, harassing the small vessel as you attempt to navigate the river.
Ongoing harassment from your enemies forces your raft to the shore. You must confront their ambush head on. If you survive this attack, the rest of your journey down the Anduin should be clear.

Traversing the Anduin River has brought you from the Forest Gate south to the land of the Beornings. You explain that yours is a mission of great urgency: you must speak with Grimbeorn the Old about what you have uncovered in Mirkwood, and share the offer of alliance from the King of Dale. The Beornings know well of this danger, but their chieftain is not present. He was last seen as a great bear, roaming south toward his stony outlook at the Carrock. You do not have the luxury of awaiting his return. To find Grimbeorn, you must set out after him at once…
After a day spent following Grimbeorn's trail, you make a startling discovery: a group of Trolls has captured the great chieftain, and plans to eat him! You draw your weapons and rush to his rescue.

Once freed from his chains, Grimbeorn joins you in your battle against the Trolls. “A barrel of beer to the one who brings me a Troll’s head!” he roars while swinging a mighty blow at the nearest foe.

The Rangers of the North patrol the wilds of Eriador, guarding against evil with ceaseless vigilance. First among their number is Aragorn, son of Arathorn. Troubled by evidence of dark powers spreading across the land, he ventures toward Rivendell, there to seek Elrond's counsel. On a forested road at the foot of the Misty Mountains, he senses an unquiet presence…

Aragorn and his companion race through the woods. Rounding a bend, they spy movement just off the road. A cloaked stranger struggles valiantly to fight off another cluster of chittering giant spiders…

Arwen confirms that giant spiders have ventured forth from Mirkwood. They have established a nest nearby, from which they shall spread their vile influence throughout Eriador. She beseeches Aragorn to help her destroy the nest and halt the spiders' advance!
Resolve Hidden Path to allow travel from this Location
Resolve Cocoon to rescue your captured Hero and allow travel from this Location
Defeat each Enemy in play to allow travel from this Location
Resolve Find the Path to allow travel from this Location
Defeat "Marsh Adder" to complete the Quest.
Resolve Find Your Friends to allow travel from this Location
Resolve Rescue Your Friends to allow travel from this Location
Resolve Escape the Spiders to allow travel from this Location
Defeat Ungoliant's Spawn to complete the Quest
Resolve Follow the Stream to advance immediately to Forest Stream, or Climb the Hill to advance immediately to Bare Hilltop
Resolve Continue Downstream to advance immediately to Mirkwood Swamp, or Search for a Path to advance immediately to Overgrown Trail
Resolve Investigate the Smoke to advance immediately to Abandoned Village, or Search for a Path to advance immediately to Overgrown Trail
Defeat Giant Marsh Worm to complete the Quest
Resolve Escape the Forest to complete the Quest
Defeat each Enemy in play to complete the Quest
Resolve Board the Raft to allow travel from this Location
Resolve Navigate the River to allow travel from this Location
Resolve Ambush on the Shore to complete the Quest
Resolve Follow Grimbeorn's Trail to allow travel from this Location
Resolve Rescue Grimbeorn to advance immediately from this Location
Defeat each Troll or resolve Delay Until Dawn to complete the Quest
Defeat all Spiders to continue your journey
Destroy the Spiders' Nest and report to Elrond in Rivendell.
You have made it across the enchanted river. With its dark waters between you and your pursuers, you are free to continue your journey through Mirkwood Forest.
Text_CN: 你成功地渡过了这条魔法之河。现在黑暗的河水挡住了你的追兵，你终于能不受阻碍地继续穿越幽暗密林了。

Text: You have defeated Ungoliant's Spawn and rescued your friends.
Text_CN: 你击败了乌苟立安特的子孙，并且救出了你的朋友！

Text: Against all odds, you have escaped from Mirkwood Forest and reached the vales of Anduin on the western end. The next leg of your journey will take you down the Anduin River to the land of the Beornings.
Text_CN: 尽管一路艰辛，但你终于还是逃出了幽暗密林并抵达了安都因河谷的西口。接下来，你需要沿着安都因河继续前进，前往比翁族的领地。

Text: You have driven back your pursuers and are free to continue your journey downriver.
Text_CN: 你打退了追兵，现在终于可以放心地继续顺流而下了。

Text: "That was fine work," exclaims Grimbeorn after the last Troll falls. Having rescued the Beorning's chieftain, at long last you can deliver King Brand's message and complete your mission.
Text_CN: 『干得漂亮！』当最后一头巨魔倒下之后，郁比翁大声夸奖着你。现在比翁族的酋长已经得救，你终于可以交付布兰德国王的信件，从而完成这项任务了！

Text: You have halted the spiders' advance; yet more adventure awaits…
Your journey has come to a tragic end.
Your journey has come to a tragic end.
Your journey has come to a tragic end.
Your journey has come to a tragic end.
Your journey has come to a tragic end.

Text: Suddenly he halted and listened. Had he heard a whistle or not? Or was it the call of some strange bird? –The Two Towers

Text: …longer and stronger than the bows of Mirkwood, and strung with a string of elf–hair. –The Fellowship of the Ring

Text: Pursuit. End of round: Add 1 Dol Guldur Orcs

Text:
Dawn breaks and turns
the Trolls to stone!

Text_CN: 装备（敌人）：在人物发动攻击后为目标增加1点威胁。

Text: "But you do not stand alone." –The Fellowship of the Ring
"Believe rather that it is so ordered that we, who sit here, and none others, must now find counsel for the peril of the world." –Elrond, The Fellowship of the Ring

Text_CN: 对玩家的每位行动完毕的人物造成1点伤害。

Text: "But I am of the House of Eorl and not a serving-woman. I can ride and wield blade, and I do not fear either pain or death." –Éowyn, The Return of the King
Gain +2 Willpower this round after the first Character is damaged
Text_CN: 每轮首次有人物被击败时，伊欧玟意志力+2，持续至轮次结束。

Text: Down from the hills leaped Erkenbrand, lord of Westfold. –The Two Towers
You find your way out of Mirkwood

Then the battle began. Some of the dwarves had knives, and some had sticks, and all of them could get stones; and Bilbo had his elvish dagger. Again and again the spiders were beaten off, and many of them were killed. But it could not go on for long. –The Hobbit
You may travel from this Location
Text_CN: 结算：允许离开这一场景。

Text: Following the winding way up the green shoulders of the hills, they came at last to the wide wind-swept walls and the gates of Edoras. —The Two Towers

Text_CN: 临终：令你控制的一位人物重新就绪。

Text: "…no road looks toward safety any longer. Be vigilant!" –Gandalf, The Return of the King

Text_CN: 令玩家控制的一名人物重新就绪。

Text: "They say in my land he can govern the storms in the Mountains of Shadow…" –Boromir, The Fellowship of the Ring
Discard all Event cards in each player's hand
Text_CN: 弃置每名玩家手中的所有事件卡牌。
令玩家的所有受伤的人物进入行动完毕状态。

Text: You may travel from this Location
Text_CN: 结算：允许离开这一场景。

Text: …he would see gleams in the darkness around them, and sometimes pairs of yellow or red or green eyes would stare at him from a little distance, and then slowly fade and disappear and slowly shine out again in another place. –The Hobbit
Sauron gains +1 Resource for each Ally
Text_CN: 场上每存在1名盟友，索隆便会获得1点资源。

Text: "The road may pass, but they shall not! Not while Faramir is Captain." –Mablung, The Two Towers
"You are indeed high in the favor of the Lady!" –Unnamed Elf of Lórien, The Fellowship of the Ring
A few brave men were strung before them to make a feint of resistance, and many there fell before the rest drew back and fled to either side. –The Hobbit
Reduce a non-unique Enemy to 0 Attack this round
Text_CN: 令一名不唯一的敌人攻击力降至0点，持续至轮次结束。

Text: You may travel from this Location
Text_CN: 结算：允许离开这一场景。

Text: That, of course, is the dangerous part about caves; you don't know how far they go back. –The Hobbit
You may travel from this Location
Text_CN: 结算：允许离开这一场景。

Text: About midday, creeping behind a great stone that stood alone like a pillar, Bilbo came on what looked like rough steps going upwards. – The Hobbit
You may travel from this Location
Text_CN: 结算：允许离开这一场景。

Text: The captured cards return to their owner's hand
Text_CN: 结算：被扣押的卡牌返回所有者的手中。

Text: …the cries of the others got steadily further and fainter, and though after a while it seemed to him they changed to yells and cries for help in the far distance, all noise at last died right away, and he was left alone in complete silence and darkness. –The Hobbit
You may travel from this Location
Text_CN: 结算：允许离开这一场景。

Text: You may travel from this Location

Text: It flowed fast and strong but not very wide right across the way, and it was black, or looked it in the gloom. –The Hobbit
"We shall have it like a coney in a trap. Then we shall learn what kind of thing it is." –Unidentified Man of Gondor, The Two Towers

Exhaust a non-unique Enemy. 
Enemy does not ready during Upkeep
Frodo began to feel restless, and the old paths seemed too well-trodden. He looked at maps and wondered what lay beyond their edges… –The Fellowship of the Ring
Stealth. Gain +2 Willpower while Sauron has 0 Resources
Text_CN: 潜行。当索隆的资源为0时，弗罗多意志力+2。

Text: "Nay, my friends, I am the lawful master of the Stone, and I had both the right and the strength to use it..." –Aragorn, The Return of the King
"…they say that you breathe so loud that they could shoot you in the dark." –Legolas, The Fellowship of the Ring

Text_CN: 远程。登场：对一名敌人造成1点伤害。

Text: Her maidens stood silent about her, and a while she looked upon her guests. –The Fellowship of the Ring
"I am a servant of the Secret Fire, wielder of the flame of Anor." –Gandalf, The Fellowship of the Ring
Fleeting. Arrival (choose): Draw 3 cards; lose 3 Threat; or deal 3 damage
Text_CN: 一闪而过。登场（选择）：抽取3张卡牌；令威胁降低3点；或对一名敌人造成3点伤害。

Text:
Reduce each Ally to 
0 Willpower this round
"Ghân-buri-Ghân will not lead you into trap." –Ghân-buri-Ghân, The Fellowship of the Ring
Stealth. Gain +X Willpower (X equals Objectives in play)
"No birds here. There are snakeses, wormses, things in the pools. Lot of things, lots of nasty things." –Gollum, The Two Towers
Stalwart. Surge. Gain 1 Threat when Giant Marsh Worm attacks
"Men need many words before deeds. My axe is restless in my hands." –Gimli, The Two Towers
Stalwart. Gain +2 Attack this round after taking damage
Text_CN: 强壮。当受到伤害时，金雳攻击+2，持续至轮次结束。

Text: Ranged. Stealth. Upkeep: Deal 1 damage to a random Character
There flowered a White Tree, and that was for Gondor… –The Return of the King

Text_CN: 装备（刚铎）：获得『格挡』关键词且生命+2。
摧毁一位英雄的一件随机装备。

Text: Upkeep: Sauron gains +1 Resource until this is resolved
"But the Lords of Minas Tirith still fight on, defying our enemies, keeping the passage of the River from Argonath to the Sea." –Elrond, The Fellowship of the Ring
"I have something to do before the end, and it lies ahead, not in the Shire. I must see it through, sir, if you understand me." –Sam Gamgee, The Fellowship of the Ring

Text_CN: 每名霍比特人物治愈4点伤害。

Text: "The hasty stroke goes oft astray," said Aragorn. "We must press our Enemy, and no longer wait on him for the next move." –The Return of the King
A Character with a weapon Attachment gains Protect
…there was a good deal of food jumbled carlessly on shelves and on the ground, among an untidy litter of plunder… –The Hobbit
You may travel from this Location
Text_CN: 结算：允许离开这一场景。

Text: "Mutton yesterday, mutton today, and blimey, if it don't look like mutton again tomorrow." –Troll, The Hobbit
In their dark cloaks, they were as invisible as if they all had magic rings. –The Fellowship of the Ring

…they went their way towards the Houses of Healing; and these were fair houses set apart, for the care of those who were grievously sick, but now they were prepared for the tending of men hurt in battle or dying. —The Return of the King
Select a Hero in your discard pile. That Hero returns to play exhausted
Text_CN: 在弃牌堆中选择一位英雄。他会以行动完毕状态返回战场。

Text: Choose: Gain 1 Threat for each Ally; or discard an Ally
Text_CN: 选择：麾下每名盟友增加1点威胁值，或者弃置麾下一名盟友。

Text: "You are in Rivendell, and you need not worry about anything for the present." –Gandalf, The Fellowship of the Ring

Text_CN: 登场：为一位人物治愈2点伤害。
结算：立刻前往废弃村庄。

Text: Ranged. Gain +1 Attack for each exhausted Enemy
All had swords at their sides… –The Two Towers
"Power to defy our Enemy is not in him, unless such power is in the earth itself." –Gandalf, The Fellowship of the Ring

Text_CN: 结算：玩家的所有人物治愈2点伤害。

Text: …glad would he have been to know its fate who wrought it slowly long ago in the North-kingdom when the Dúnedain were young… –The Return of the King
Gain +1 Attack for each Resource in your pool (limit +3)
Text_CN: 装备：玩家每有1点资源则攻击+1（至多攻击+3）。

Text: "I can walk this path, but others have not this skill." –Legolas, The Fellowship of the Ring
"…it is more strengthing than any food made by Men, and it is more pleasant than cram, by all accounts. –Lórien Elf, The Fellowship of the Ring
Restore 2 Health to a Character and Ready them
"That is the fairest of all the dwellings of my people. There are no trees like the tress of that land." –Legolas, The Fellowship of the Ring
Capture 2 random cards from each player's hand
Text_CN: 从每名玩家手中随机扣押2张卡牌。
每名巨魔敌人均获得关键词『强壮』。

Text: Gain 1 Threat after you play a card until this is resolved
Text_CN: 强制：当玩家打出卡牌后，此玩家的威胁值增加1点。

Text: But the Captains of the West were well warned by their scouts, skilled men from Henneth Annûn led by Mablung… –The Return of the King

Text_CN: 远程。登场：令一名不唯一的敌人立刻进入行动完毕状态。

Text: Under the boughs of Mirkwood there was deadly strife of Elves and Men and fell beasts. –The Fellowship of the Ring
"Let none now reject the counsels of Gandalf, whose long labours against Sauron come at last to their test." –Aragorn, The Return of the King

Text_CN: 每名巨魔均获得关键词『格挡』。

Text: Ambush. Muck Adder attacks the Character with the lowest current Health
Text_CN: 先攻。淤泥蝰蛇会攻击玩家手中当前生命值最低的人物。

Text: You may travel from this Location
Text_CN: 结算：允许离开这一场景。
登场：添加1头兽人猎犬，且无需花费成本。
追逐。所有兽人获得关键词『追逐』。

Text: When Orc Marauder attacks, Sauron gains +1 Resource
Text_CN: 强制：当兽人掠夺者攻击时，索隆获得1点资源。

Text: Inside the hall there was piled a large assortment of packages and parcels and small articles of furniture. –The Fellowship of the Ring
The next Character that a Spider damages but does not defeat is exhausted until after Upkeep
Text_CN: 蓄势：下次有人物受到蜘蛛攻击但未被击败时，此人物在下个休整阶段前都无法重新就绪。

Text: Exhaust the next Ally that enters play
Text_CN: 蓄势：下个进入游戏的盟友会立刻进入行动完毕状态。

Text: Deal 1 damage to a random Character. Repeat for each Enemy (limit 3)
Text_CN: 对游戏中的一位随机玩家的人物造成1点伤害。场上每有1名敌人，则此效果重复一次。

Text: "He stands not alone," said Legolas, bending his bow and fitting an arrow with hands that moved quicker than sight. "You would die before your stroke fell." —Legolas, The Two Towers
Discard the next Attachment that Sauron plays
Text_CN: 蓄势：弃置索隆打出的下一张装备牌。

Text: "…for he that strikes the first blow, if he strikes it hard enough, may need to strike no more." –Gandalf, The Two Towers
Gain Ambush on your next attack; may attack during Planning phase
Now men came bearing raiment of war from the king's hoard… –The Two Towers
Arrows thick as the rain came whistling over the battlements, and fell clinking and glancing on the stones. Many found their mark. –The Two Towers

Text_CN: 游戏中每名敌人受到1点伤害。

Text: "Rangers have been here lately. It is they who left the firewood behind." –Aragorn, The Fellowship of the Ring
Two had spears in their hands with broad bright heads. –The Two Towers

Gain +1 Attack, and deal 
an additional +1 damage when defending
Play a random non-unique Ally from your deck

Text: A nice pickle they were all in now. –The Hobbit
You release Grimbeorn and travel immediately to the Carrock

Text: Then, one of the ponies took fright at nothing and bolted. –The Hobbit

Text_CN: 结算：每名玩家获得2点资源。

Text: Bilbo was horrified, now that he noticed them for the first time dangling in the shadows, to see a dwarvish foot sticking out from the bottoms of some of the bundles, or here and there the tip of a nose, or a bit of beard or of a hood. –The Hobbit

Text_CN: 结算：每名被扣押的英雄均返回其所有者的游戏区。

Text: After him thundered the knights of his house. –The Return of the King
In battle they wielded heavy two-handed mattocks; but each of them had also a short broad sword at his side and a round shield slung at his back. —The Hobbit

Text_CN: 一名随机玩家的人物被扣押，并被装入巨魔口袋。

Text: "I'm going with him… and if any of those Black Riders try to stop him, they'll have Sam Gamgee to reckon with." –Sam Gamgee, The Fellowship of the Ring

Text_CN: 结算：立刻前往林蔓小径。

Text: …Beorn advised them to take this way; for at a place a few days' ride due north of the Carrock was the gate of a little–known pathway through Mirkwood… –The Hobbit

Text_CN: 令一个目标获得2点进度。

Text: …how much more of this would they have to endure, or could they endure? –The Two Towers

Text_CN: 休整：为一位人物治愈1点伤害。

Text: "The Wood–elves tracked him first, an easy task for them, for his trail was still fresh then." –Gandalf, The Fellowship of the Rings

Text_CN: 登场：令一位人物获得关键词『潜行』，持续至轮次结束。

Text: There is a seed of courage hidden (often deeply, it is true) in the heart of the fattest and most timid hobbit, waiting for some final and desperate danger to make it grow. –The Fellowship of the Ring

Text_CN: 令一位随机盟友登场为你效力。此盟友获得关键词『一闪而过』。

Text: You destroy the Spiders' nest. Cannot engage while King Spider is in play
"I do not know what they are about: possibly there is some trouble away south from which they are fleeing; but I think they are spying out the land." -The Fellowship of the Ring
Then, one of the ponies took fright at nothing and bolted. –The Hobbit
Deal 2 damage to each Character in a Troll Sack; then release and exhaust each until after Upkeep
"…we will fight on." –Boromir, The Fellowship of the Ring
…each cloak was pinned upon the left shoulder by a brooch of silver shaped like a rayed star. –The Return of the King
"Do what you will; but I will hinder it, if I may." –Éowyn, The Return of the King

Text_CN: 休整：每位巨魔敌人治愈1点伤害。

Text: But suddenly he too stumbled forward… and his stroke went wide, driving into the ground. —The Return of the King
"We're going on; but we'll settle with you first. Come on, and taste it again!" –Sam Gamgee, The Two Towers
Gain Ambush when defending against the next attack
You have rescued the cloaked stranger from the Spiders' ambush
There was an eye in the Dark Tower that did not sleep. He knew that it had become aware of his gaze. A fierce eager will was there. –The Fellowship of the Ring

Text_CN: 游戏中每位敌人攻击永久+1。

Text: No folk could they see, nor hear any feet upon the paths; but there were many voices, about them, and in the air above. –The Fellowship of the Ring

Return a Silvan Ally to your hand to play a random 
Silvan Ally
"What nasty thick skins they have to be sure, but I'll wager there is good juice inside." –Spider, The Hobbit
Each Ally that enters play is exhausted until this is resolved
Text_CN: 强制：进入游戏的每名盟友都将立刻进入行动完毕状态。

Text: "By fire, sun and moon, harken now and hear us! Come, Tom Bombadil, for our need is near us!" –Frodo, The Fellowship of the Ring
"But it will be hard to find the path unless the fog lifts a little later on." –Aragorn, The Fellowship of the Ring
After you play a card, lose a random card from your hand
Text_CN: 蓄势：在一位玩家打出卡牌后，从他的手中随机弃置1张卡牌。
对游戏中的每名盟友造成1点伤害。
结算：人物得到解救，并返回游戏区。

Text: One moment Glorfindel turned and listened, then he sprang forward with a loud cry… "Fly! The enemy is upon us!" —Glorfindel, The Fellowship of the Ring

Text_CN: 临终：令一名随机敌人进入行动完毕状态。

Text: Restore each Objective to its full Quest value
Text_CN: 结算游戏中的每个目标为初始冒险值。

Text: Reduce each player's hand size to 5 cards until this is resolved
"Here am I, naughty little fly; you are fat and lazy You cannot trap me, though you try, in your cobwebs crazy." –Bilbo Baggins, The Hobbit
Ready after defeating an Enemy or resolving an Objective
End of round: Each Spider gains +1 Health
Text_CN: 轮次结束:游戏中的每位蜘蛛生命+1。

Text: Upkeep: Add 1 Hatchling Spider. Each Hatchling Spider gains +1 Attack and Guard
Text_CN: 每只育卵蜘蛛攻击+1并获得关键词『哨兵』。休整：添加1只育卵蜘蛛，且无需花费成本。
装备（敌人）：获得关键词『强壮』。

Text: "I am glad to have you standing nigh with your stout legs and your hard axe." –Legolas, The Two Towers
…but certainly there was something not entirely hobbit-like about them, and once in a while members of the Took-clan would go and have adventures. –The Hobbit
Rangers passed at times beyond the hills, but they were few and did not stay. –The Fellowship of the Ring

Text_CN: 追逐。所有兽人获得关键词『追逐』。

Text: "Yet I do not bid you flee from peril, but to ride to battle where your sword may win renown and victory." —Aragorn, The Return of the King
End of round: Gain 1 Threat until this is resolved

For a moment Frodo stood near the brink and let the water flow over his tired feet. It was cold but its touch was clean, and as he went on and it mounted to his knees, he felt that the strain of travel and all weariness was washed from his limbs. –The Fellowship of the Ring

Text_CN: 为一名人物治愈3点伤害。

Text: "Erkenbrand of Westfold has drawn off those men he could gather towards his fastness at Helm's Deep. The rest are scattered." –Rider of Rohan, The Two Towers
Arrival: Deal 2 damage to an undamaged Enemy
Text_CN: 登场：对一名未受到伤害的敌人造成2点伤害。

Text: …the woodland folk were altogether noiseless in their movements. —The Fellowship of the Ring

Text_CN: 登场：令一个目标获得1点进度。

Text: "Ever up now we went, until we came to the Endless Stair… From the lowest dungeon to the highest peak it climbed, ascending in unbroken spiral in many thousand steps, until it issued at last in Durin's Tower carved in the living rock of Zirak-zigil, the pinnacle of the Silvertine." —Gandalf, The Two Towers

Congratulations! You have completed the prologue, but that was merely the beginning. 

Create an Asmodee.net account now to unlock additional Heroes and cards to use on your further adventures across Middle-earth…
Your Asmodee.net account gives you many rewards: new Heroes, cards, a starter deck, a gift of 3000 Valor Points, and the first Quest free!
The time has come to begin your journey. Go forth and fare well!

Text_CN: This is a placeholder text for exporting string over 255 characters so do not remove. This is a placeholder text for exporting string over 255 characters so do not remove. This is a placeholder text for exporting string over 255 characters so do not remove.

Text: You take turns with Sauron during this phase, and may attack Enemies or engage Objectives.
Text_CN: 关键词。拥有此关键词的人物会在轮次结束时离开游戏并被弃置。

Text: A card type representing friends, followers, creatures, and hirelings that you can play to assist your Heroes on their Quest.
Text_CN: 这是玩家在前往下个场景前所必须完成的主要目标。

Text: (Keyword) The attacker resolves damage before the target does. If this defeats the target, the attacker takes no damage.
Text_CN: 这是玩家在冒险中使用的盟友、装备与事件卡牌的统称。玩家卡牌要么会具备中立属性，要么会属于四大属性类别中的一种：领导型、博学型、精神型与战术型。

Text: (Trait) An Attachment type. A Character can have only one Attachment of each type at a time.
(Keyword) The ability triggers when the card enters play.
Text_CN: 魔多与艾辛格手下的大型兽人士兵，这是『Uruk-hai』的英文化写法。

Text: A card type representing armor, weapons, or special abilities. Unless otherwise stated, it modifies only the Character or Enemy to which it is equipped.
Effectiveness when attacking or defending in combat.
Text_CN: 卡牌大类。代表所有的英雄与盟友。当玩家有机会选择一位人物时，你可以选择任何可用的英雄或盟友。敌人也会被视为人物，并可以成为对人物起效的游戏效果的有效目标。

Text: The icon shown in your profile.
Text_CN: 中土世界的种族之一，并非特指『男人』。

Text: (Keyword) Each time damage is taken, reduces the amount by 1.
Text_CN: 在每个轮次开始时玩家都会进行休整：你的威胁值会上升至少1点；所有行动完毕的卡牌都会再次可用；玩家与索隆的资源都会更新；玩家可从牌组中抽取1张卡牌；一些特定的技能可在这个时期内使用。

Text: A series of 5 Quests that tell a larger story.
Text_CN: 关键词。拥有此项关键词的人物在发动攻击时会得到等同于此项数值的加成。

Text: The first time you log into the game every 24 hours, the game generates a challenge tied to a random unlocked Quest. You receive Valor (and potential additional rewards) for completing each daily challenge.
Text_CN: 这是真知晶石提供的奖励，或者也可在游玩困难难度时获取。你可以使用5个信号火炬来解锁一个你选定的英雄包。

Text: Achievements that are tracked over the lifetime of your account.
Text_CN: 关键词。拥有此关键词的人物会在敌人发动攻击前抢先发起反击。如果此举能够击败敌人，那么敌人就无法发动攻击了，否则敌人将正常结算攻击流程。

Text: This card type refers to all Heroes and Allies.
Displayed in the upper-left corner, this is the number of Resources needed to play a card. Hero cards do not have a cost, since they begin the game in play.
Text_CN: 由3到5个场景所构成的特制冒险故事。

Text: A defeated Character or Enemy is discarded. This can occur by falling to 0 Health or through some other means.
Text_CN: 完成目标所需耗费的意志力点数。

Text: The challenge level you face in a Quest: Easy, Normal, or Hard. Sauron's Resources increase as the difficulty goes up, but you can gain greater rewards if you survive!
Text_CN: 你会在这个阶段内与索隆进行回合制的较量，并可攻击敌人或者挑战目标。

Text: (Trait) One of the Dúnedain, the Men of the West.
Text_CN: 中土世界中最杰出的人类王国。

Text: The act of committing a Character to an Objective.
Text_CN: 关键词。当游戏中存在敌人时，玩家无法挑战拥有此关键词的目标。

Text: A card type that covers any scheme, twist of fate, or other effect that occurs during the game.
Text_CN: 游玩困难难度时获得的勇猛点数加成。

Text: A card is exhausted when it is used. All exhausted cards ready during Upkeep, unless noted otherwise.
An expendable card that you can use for an immediate in-game effect.
Text_CN: 显示在你的概况界面上的图标。

Text: (Keyword) The card is discarded at the end of the round.
Text_CN: 这种属性类别注重于思维上的潜力。认知、智识、经验以及专门类别的知识都属于博学型的范畴。

Text: (Trait) A person from the most prominent kingdom of Men in Middle-earth.
Text_CN: 关键词。拥有此关键词的人物必须被首先击败，随后那些没有哨兵关键词的人物才能成为攻击目标。

Text: (Keyword) You must defeat this target before you can attack another.
Text_CN: 消耗性卡牌，使用后可以即刻获得一个游戏效果。玩家可以在冒险开始时将一张神恩卡牌添加到牌桌上。

Text: The amount of damage a Character or Enemy can suffer before being defeated.
Text_CN: 冒险上演的舞台。完成冒险需要探索一系列的场景。

Text: A main Character that you control during a Quest. Heroes start the game in play, and have a Threat value instead of a cost. If all your Heroes are defeated, you fail the Quest.
(Trait) One of a race of gentle beings with a reputation for preferring a settled life over excitement and adventure.
Text_CN: 此数值只会出现在英雄卡牌上。当玩家在冒险中使用英雄时，它会在冒险开始时添加到威胁值计量器中。

Text: (Trait) An individual such as Gandalf or Saruman who is more than mortal and possessed of great age and power.
A Sphere of Influence representing the potential to lead, inspire, and command others.
Text_CN: 对于成为行动对象的人物或任务的一般性描述。

Text: A distinct Quest stage. Completing a Quest requires advancing through a series of Locations.
Text_CN: 游戏中存在四种属性类别：领导型、博学型、精神型与战术型。每种类别均注重于一种特定属性的强度。每个英雄都会从属于一个类别，这也决定了你在牌组中可以使用的卡牌种类。

Text: A Sphere of Influence emphasizing intellect, wisdom, and specialized knowledge.
Text_CN: 在这个阶段中，玩家与索隆会依次从各自的牌组中布置盟友、装备与事件卡牌。
关键词。拥有此关键词的人物在第一次受到攻击时不会进入行动完毕状态。

Text: (Trait) A person from the second clan of the Elves.
Text_CN: 关键词。拥有此关键词的技能会在这张卡牌击败其他人时自动触发。

Text: A task that you may face in the course of a Quest.
Text_CN: 人物在挑战目标时的效率。

Text: The primary goal you must resolve before you can advance to the next Location.
(Trait) A member of an evil and violent race who serve Sauron.
You can use the Palantír to gain rewards such as cards and Valor points.
During this phase, you and Sauron take turns playing cards prior to adventuring.
Text_CN: 这种属性类别注重于军事技艺，特别是那些在冒险中所需处理的战斗与战术挑战。

Text: These are any Ally, Attachment, and Event cards you use throughout a Quest.
A deck of 30 cards based on 3 Heroes of your choice. You build each deck based on these Heroes, and you cannot have more than 2 copies of any individual card.
Text_CN: 将人物派去挑战目标的游戏操作。

Text: (Keyword) An ability that you may choose to activate.
(Trait) An Event card type whose effect triggers based on a timing window or circumstance.
Text_CN: 关键词。在每次受到伤害时，拥有此关键词的人物的具体伤害数值会降低1点。

Text: The amount by which you reduce an Objective's Quest value each time you apply Willpower.
Text_CN: 每隔24小时，当玩家首次登录游戏后，游戏都会提供一项与已解锁的随机冒险相关的任务。完成每日任务后，玩家便会得到一项勇猛奖励（以及可能会存在的额外奖励）。

Text: (Keyword) The Enemy follows your Heroes from one Location to the next.
Text_CN: 关键词。只有在所有未拥有潜行关键词的人物全部行动完毕后，拥有此关键词的人物才会受到攻击。

Text: The rating of how much Willpower is required to resolve an Objective.
(Keyword) The attacker does not take damage when attacking an exhausted target.
Text_CN: 这是玩家使用的盟友、装备与事件卡牌的搭配组合。在冒险过程中，玩家需要从中抽取卡牌来进行游戏。每个牌组拥有30张卡牌，并且任何卡牌都不会重复。牌组的基础是3张由玩家所选定的英雄，他们决定了玩家可从牌组中抽取的卡牌的属性类别。

Text: Each player card has a listed rarity: Starter, Common, Uncommon, Rare, Legendary, or by pack title. The less common a card is, the more potent its abilities.
The act of completing, overcoming, or otherwise removing an Objective.
Text_CN: 关键词。拥有此关键词的卡牌技能会在人物进入游戏时即刻触发。

Text: A pool you can use on your turn to play cards from your deck. Resources refresh during Upkeep.
Text_CN: 卡牌大类。代表在冒险中协助你的英雄的朋友、随从、生物以及雇佣军。盟友会作为手牌打出，并在游戏中持续生效，直至他们被击败或者因卡牌效果而被移除为止。

Text: (Keyword) The ability triggers when the Character or Enemy is defeated.
Text_CN: 关键词。拥有此关键词的卡牌会在每个轮次结束后令玩家的威胁值额外增加1点。

Text: A person from the kingdom between the Misty Mountains and White Mountains.
(Trait) An Elf who is more interested in knowledge than in combat, compared to their Noldor cousins.
Text_CN: 完成、战胜或者移除一项目标的行动。

Text: (Trait) An Attachment type. A Character can have only one Attachment of each type at a time.

Each of the four Spheres of Influence (Leadership, Lore, Spirit, Tactics) focuses on a particular personality aspect. Every Hero belongs to a Sphere, which dictates the cards you can include in a deck.
A Sphere of Influence encompassing strength of will and aspects of the supernatural.
Text_CN: 英雄是你在冒险中所控制的主要人物。英雄可以攻击敌人或者挑战目标，并拥有一些可用使用的特技。英雄也是你创建的每个牌组的基础，他决定了你可用来选择组成牌组的卡牌的类别。在游戏开始时，英雄便会配置完毕。他们的成本值会被威胁值所取代。如果你的英雄全部战败，那么冒险也就会宣告失败了。

Text: (Keyword) The Character or Enemy does not exhaust the first time it is attacked.
Text_CN: 包含5张卡牌的捆绑包，每个捆绑包中包含1名英雄，以及每种属性类别的卡牌各1张。

Text: (Keyword) The Character or Enemy cannot be attacked unless all other targets without Stealth are exhasuted.
(Keyword) The Character or Enemy does not exhaust the first time it takes an action.
Text_CN: 这是有关各项冒险中的索隆的挑战度的一项衡量。游戏中存在三种难度等级：简单、普通与困难。索隆的资源数量会随难度的增加而升高，然而如果你能撑过高难度的冒险，那么你获得的奖励也会更为丰厚！

Text: A Sphere of Influence emphasizing martial prowess, from tactical challenges to direct combat.
The general term for a card that is the object of an action.
This tracks the level of risk you take during a Quest. Your Threat increases at the end of each round and when you travel. If you reach 50 Threat, you fail the Quest.
At the start of a Quest, this number is applied from each Hero to the Threat meter.
Some cards have traits which indicate certain behavior or restrictions.
Text_CN: 关键词。拥有此关键词的人物不会在执行首次行动后便进入行动完毕状态。

Text: At the start of each round, your cards ready, you gain Resources, and you draw 1 card from your deck; Sauron then does the same. Certain abilities may also activate at this time.
In-game rewards that you can spend to get Quests, Heroes, cards, and more.
(Keyword) The ability triggers when this card defeats another Character or Enemy.
Text_CN: 关键词。拥有此关键词的人物受到的下一次伤害会被强制格挡，伤害会强制取消。随后人物便会失去防护关键词。

Text: (Trait) An Attachment type. A Character can have only one Attachment of each type at a time.
A Character's effectiveness when engaging an Objective.
Text_CN: 这种属性类别注重于魅力与激励同伴的能力，它代表着统率、鼓励与命令盟友和其他英雄的潜力。
